climbs.name: You Don't Got It Till You Get It
climbs.fa: Matt Beebe, Kelly Vaught, Frank Bentwood, Summer 2017

content.description: Step off a jagged boulder to start.  A powerful first move leads to easier climbing up surprisingly positive holds until the end, where the holds diminish, culminating in a desperate mantle over the top.
content.location: Steep face just to the right of Sugar Shack.  This route primarily faces North.

climbs.name: Two Scoops
climbs.fa: Matt Beebe, Zach Grove, Sophia Arvizu,  Spring 2017

content.description: From the notch step onto the slab and mantle onto a black knob then climb up to another black knob and do another mantle, than execute the crux moves on thin holds and continue to the top.  A TCU protects the last moves.
content.location: Just left of the Sugar Shack there is a notch from which this excellent slab can be accessed.  The route faces East.

content.description: A powerful start to a second crux at the end.  The route takes the steepest line on the crag and faces North/East
content.location: This route is very steep and is on the formation just up the hill and West of Ride The Lighting

content.description: A powerful layback start to an awkward jag left to a strenuous finger crack.  This climb is a power-endurance race from the moment you pull on and will test your fitness.
content.protection: bolt and medium sized cam for anchor.  Bring long slings for extension.
content.location: This route is in the center of an overhanging wall that is graced with several shallow right leaning cracks.  The route is shaped like a lighting bolt.

content.description: Tricky climbing up a shallow right leaning crack with the most difficult moves coming toward the end.
content.protection: bolt and medium size cam for anchor.  Bring a long sling extension for this anchor.
content.location: This route starts about 20ft to the left of Ride The Lightning.

content.description: This steep, short finger crack is difficult to protect and a better top rope than lead.
content.protection: Spinner Bolt on top, small TCU for directional
content.location: To the right of You Don't Got It Till You Get It.  This route faces North.
